Directions: Cook the brussels sprouts according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender. Stir in brown sugar, flour, salt, mustard and pepper until blended. Gradually add milk. bring to a boil; cook and stir for 1 minute. Reduce heat to low. Drain sprouts; cut in half. Add to sauce and heat through. Stir in sour cream and pimientos.
